dcterms:creator: K. M. Hermann
T. Kocisky
E. Grefenstette
L. Espeholt
W. Kay
M. Suleyman
P. Blunsom
dcterms:description: A corpus that consists of <document, highlight (one-sentence summary)> pairs, modified from an existing corpus used for passage-based question answering, containing news documents and corresponding highlights from CNN and Daily Mail.
dcterms:title: One-sentence Abstractive Summarization

dcterms:creator: D. Kauchak
dcterms:description: A corpus built from Simple English Wikipedia articles, representing a simplified version of traditional English Wikipedia articles, used for text simplification tasks.
dcterms:title: Text Simplification
